div.p:
Today I send your
friend - pages 13-28
& 29-44 3d Revise
These are all con-
tinuous narrative
chapters & contents
of Do. They are
revised by himself
and contain all
mine too - so I
think all that is
required with them
is to see that the
printer puts all
needed corrections
in & if these are
all off my mind
then I will send
continuous narrative
all through. First
Revises I shall
send to Clowes
but as a great
deal is in 2nd &
3d these I will
send to you to be
as these are to be
plus the present
corrections out of
hand. If all your
workmen are as
troublesome to you
as I am then
your life is a
burden to you.
I sent a lot of the
beginning part
to you yesterday
& think that
probably the parcel
contains what
your friend
wants. But
in case of omission
I send today 2d
Revise up to page 48.
A good friend of mine
to whom I shewed
the introduction
thought that a line
such as that in the
2d page was necessary
I asked him to put
in his idea, and he
did it in the line
which I refer to,
and as it is quite
true, it might be
inserted. If however
it is too late never
mind. I mention
it simply because
it is true & some
might expect it.
